trans-unit.source: Represents a list of items and tasks displayed as a menu on a [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar button.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma lista de itens e tarefas apresentadas como um menu num [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] botão da barra de tarefas.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality for starting programs directly from the taskbar button by using Jump Lists.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] na barra de tarefas fornece a funcionalidade melhorada para iniciar programas diretamente a partir do botão da barra de tarefas utilizando ir apresenta uma lista.

trans-unit.source: Jump Lists are also used in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] Start menu.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta uma lista de ir também é utilizada no [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] menu Iniciar.

trans-unit.source: You access a Jump List by right-clicking a taskbar button or by clicking the arrow next to a program in the Start menu.
trans-unit.target: Aceder a uma lista de ir ao clicar num botão de barra de tarefas ou clicando na seta junto de um programa no menu Iniciar.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Jump Lists, see the [Taskbar](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478) section of the Windows User Experience Interaction Guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre listas de ir, consulte o [na barra de tarefas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478) secção as diretrizes de interação de experiência de utilizador do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The JumpList class provides a managed wrapper for the Jump List functionality in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar and manages the data passed to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: A classe de JumpList fornece um wrapper gerido para a funcionalidade de lista de avançar no [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] na barra de tarefas e gere os dados transmitidos para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: The functionality exposed by the JumpList class is not available in versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade exposta pela classe de JumpList não está disponível em versões do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] anteriores ao [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Applications that use the JumpList class will run in other versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)], but the Jump List will not be available.
trans-unit.target: As aplicações que utilizam a classe de JumpList serão executado noutras versões do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)], mas a lista de ir não estarão disponível.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Windows shell and native Jump List APIs, see [Taskbar Extensions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a shell do Windows e ir lista as APIs nativas, consulte [extensões da barra de tarefas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479).

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the Jump List for Windows Media Player, with items in the **Tasks** and **Frequent** categories.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração seguinte mostra a ir lista para o Windows Media Player, com itens de **tarefas** e **Frequent** categorias.

trans-unit.source: ![Windows Media Player Jump List](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player Jump List") Windows Media Player Jump List ## Configuring a Jump List Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.
trans-unit.target: ![Lista de ir do Windows Media Player](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player ir lista") Windows Media Player ir lista # # configurar um ir lista ir lista pode conter dois tipos de itens, um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> is a link to a program and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is a link to a file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>é uma hiperligação para um programa e um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>é uma hiperligação para um ficheiro.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> specified.
trans-unit.target: Pode separar visualmente itens numa lista ir criando um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>que não tem um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: This empty <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Este vazio <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>será apresentada como uma linha horizontal na lista de ir.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the type of the file specified in a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is not registered with your application, the file will not appear in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se o tipo do ficheiro especificado num <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>não está registado com a sua aplicação, o ficheiro não serão apresentados na lista de ir.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you add a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> that points to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>que aponta para um ficheiro. txt, a aplicação tem de estar registada para processar os ficheiros. txt.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Introduction to File Associations](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [introdução para associações de ficheiros](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480).

trans-unit.source: Jump items are placed into categories in the JumpList.
trans-unit.target: Itens de ir são colocadas em categorias no JumpList.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem> is displayed in the **Tasks** category.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>é apresentado no **tarefas** categoria.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can specify a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the standard **Recent** and **Frequent** categories are displayed in the JumpList by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar se o padrão **Recent** e **Frequent** categorias são apresentadas no JumpList definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: The contents of these categories are managed by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo destas categorias é gerido pelo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: Because these categories might contain much of the same data, you typically display one or the other in your JumpList, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Porque estas categorias poderão contêm uma grande parte dos mesmos dados, é normalmente apresenta um ou outro no seu JumpList, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] automatically manages recent items if they are opened through a common file dialog box or used to open an application through file type association.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]gere automaticamente itens recentes, se estiver abertos através de uma caixa de diálogo de ficheiros comuns ou utilizados para abrir uma aplicação através da associação de tipos de ficheiro.

trans-unit.source: When an item is accessed through the Jump List, you can notify the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell to add the item to the **Recent** category by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando um item é acedido através da lista de ir, pode notificar a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell para adicionar o item para o **Recent** categoria ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applying a Jump List to the Windows Shell You cannot access the shell’s Jump List directly or read its contents into the JumpList class.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar uma lista de ir para o Windows Shell que não é possível aceder diretamente à lista de ir para a shell ou ler o respetivo conteúdo para a classe de JumpList.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the JumpList class provides a representation of a Jump List that you can work with, and then apply to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, a classe de JumpList fornece uma representação de uma lista de ir pode trabalhar com o e, em seguida, aplicar para as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: You typically create a JumpList and set it one time when the application is first run.
trans-unit.target: Criar um JumpList normalmente e defini-lo uma vez quando a aplicação é executada pela primeira vez.

trans-unit.source: However, you can modify or replace the JumpList at run time.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, pode modificar ou substitua JumpList em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: When you have set the JumpList properties, you must apply the JumpList to the Windows shell before its contents appear in the taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Quando tiver definido as propriedades de JumpList, tem de aplicar JumpList ao shell do Windows antes do respetivo conteúdo apresentado na barra de tarefas lista ir.

trans-unit.source: This is done automatically when the JumpList is first attached to an application, either in XAML or in a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Isto é feito automaticamente quando JumpList primeiro está ligado a uma aplicação, em XAML ou numa chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you modify the contents of the JumpList at run time, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method to apply its current contents to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Se modificar o conteúdo do JumpList em tempo de execução, tem de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>método para aplicar o respetivo conteúdo atual para a shell do Windows.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting a Jump List in XAML A JumpList is not automatically attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: A definição de uma lista de avançar no XAML A JumpList não é automaticamente anexada a um <xref:System.Windows.Application>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: You attach a JumpList to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> object in XAML by using the attached property syntax.
trans-unit.target: Anexar um JumpList para um <xref:System.Windows.Application>objeto em XAML, utilizando a sintaxe de propriedade anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: The JumpList class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to support XAML declaration of a JumpList.
trans-unit.target: Implementa de classe JumpList o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>interface para suportar a declaração de XAML de um JumpList.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: If the JumpList is declared in XAML and attached to the current <xref:System.Windows.Application>, it is automatically applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell when the JumpList is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Se JumpList é declarado em XAML e ligado à atual <xref:System.Windows.Application>, é aplicada automaticamente para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell quando é inicializado JumpList.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: Setting and Modifying a Jump List in Code You attach a JumpList to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> object in code by calling the static <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A definição e modificar uma lista de avançar no código que anexar um JumpList para um <xref:System.Windows.Application>objeto no código ao chamar a estática <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: This also applies the JumpList to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: Isto também se aplica a JumpList para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: To modify a JumpList at run time, you call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A> method to get the JumpList that is currently attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar um JumpList em tempo de execução, pode chama o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A>método para obter JumpList que está atualmente ligado a um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you have modified the properties of the JumpList, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method to apply the changes to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Depois de modificar as propriedades de JumpList, tem de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>método para aplicar as alterações para a shell do Windows.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You typically create one JumpList that is attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Application> and applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Criam geralmente um JumpList que está ligado ao <xref:System.Windows.Application>e aplicadas a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create multiple JumpList objects.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, pode criar vários objetos JumpList.

trans-unit.source: Only one JumpList at a time can be applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell, and only one JumpList at a time can be associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: JumpList apenas um numa altura pode ser aplicado a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] uma JumpList shell e apenas um momento pode ser associado com um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not require that these be the same JumpList.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework não requer que estas estejam JumpList mesmo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esta classe contém um pedido de ligação ao nível da classe que se aplica a todos os membros.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>é acionada quando o chamador imediato não tem permissão de fidedignidade total.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre exigências de segurança, consulte [exigências de ligação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [exigências de herança](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> class with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> classe com os parâmetros especificados.

trans-unit.source: The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items.
trans-unit.target: O **Recent** e **Frequent** categorias contém muitas vezes, muitos dos itens ir mesmo.

trans-unit.source: As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, as aplicações normalmente apresentam um o **Recent** ou **Frequent** categoria na lista de ir, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"></xref> objects that are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"> </xref> objetos que são apresentados na lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se os itens utilizados com frequência são apresentadas na lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether recently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se os itens utilizados recentemente são apresentadas na lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified item path to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o caminho de item especificado para o **Recent** categoria da lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo a **Recent** categoria são geridos através da shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar os itens utilizados recentemente na lista ir, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call the AddToRecentCategory method to request that the Windows shell add an item path to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Pode chamar o método AddToRecentCategory para pedir que a shell do Windows, adicione um caminho de item para o **Recent** lista de itens.

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to AddToRecentCategory will fail silently.
trans-unit.target: Se a aplicação não está registada para processar o tipo de ficheiro do item, não irão aparecer no **Recent** lista e chamadas para AddToRecentCategory falhará silenciosamente.

trans-unit.source: The path to add to the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: O caminho para o adicionar à lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified jump path to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o caminho especificado Ir para o **Recent** categoria da lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo a **Recent** categoria são geridos através da shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar os itens utilizados recentemente na lista ir, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call the AddToRecentCategory method to request that the Windows shell add the specified jump path to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Pode chamar o método AddToRecentCategory para pedir que a shell do Windows, adicione o caminho especificado Ir para o **Recent** lista de itens.

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to AddToRecentCategory will fail silently.
trans-unit.target: Se a aplicação não está registada para processar o tipo de ficheiro do item, não irão aparecer no **Recent** lista e chamadas para AddToRecentCategory falhará silenciosamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath"></xref> to add to the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath"> </xref> para adicionar à lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified jump task to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a tarefa de ir especificado para o **Recent** categoria da lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo a **Recent** categoria são geridos através da shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar os itens utilizados recentemente na lista ir, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call the AddToRecentCategory method to request that the Windows shell add the specified jump task to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Pode chamar o método AddToRecentCategory para pedir que a shell do Windows adicionar a tarefa de ir especificada para o **Recent** lista de itens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask"></xref> to add to the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask"> </xref> para adicionar à lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: Sends the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> to the Windows shell in its current state.
trans-unit.target: Envia o <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> ao shell do Windows no seu estado atual.

trans-unit.source: The Apply method sends the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to the Windows shell in its current state.
trans-unit.target: O método de aplicar envia o conteúdo a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>ao shell do Windows no seu estado atual.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: After this call is complete, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois desta chamada está concluída, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>propriedade é modificada para incluir apenas os itens que a shell do Windows foi adicionada com êxito para a barra de tarefas lista ir.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder as listas de itens removidos através de processadores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> is not completely initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> não foi completamente inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> initialization.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizar o início do <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> inicialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to support XAML declaration of a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>classe implementa a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>interface para suportar a declaração de <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> XAML</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The BeginInit method is only called when the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is declared in XAML and attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> by using the attached property syntax.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginInit apenas é chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>é declarado em XAML e ligada a um <xref:System.Windows.Application>utilizando a sintaxe de propriedade anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You do not call this method from your code.
trans-unit.target: Não chame este método a partir do código.

trans-unit.source: This call to BeginInit is nested in a previous call to BeginInit.
trans-unit.target: Esta chamada para BeginInit for aninhada uma chamada anterior para BeginInit.

trans-unit.source: Signals the end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> initialization.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizar final a <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> inicialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to support XAML declaration of a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>classe implementa a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>interface para suportar a declaração de <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> XAML</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The EndInit method is only called when the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is declared in XAML and attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> by using the attached property syntax.
trans-unit.target: O método EndInit apenas é chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>é declarado em XAML e ligada a um <xref:System.Windows.Application>utilizando a sintaxe de propriedade anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You do not call this method from your code.
trans-unit.target: Não chame este método a partir do código.

trans-unit.source: The EndInit method has the same effect as the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método EndInit tem o mesmo efeito que o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>

trans-unit.source: EndInit sends the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to the Windows shell in its current state.
trans-unit.target: EndInit envia o conteúdo a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>ao shell do Windows no seu estado atual.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: After this call is complete, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois desta chamada está concluída, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>propriedade é modificada para incluir apenas os itens que a shell do Windows adicionada com êxito à lista de ir.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder as listas de itens removidos através de processadores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>

trans-unit.source: This call to EndInit is not paired with a call to <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit*>.
trans-unit.target: Esta chamada para EndInit não se encontra emparelhada com uma chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit*>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> object associated with an application.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> objeto associado a uma aplicação.

trans-unit.source: You can call the GetJumpList method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> currently associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Pode chamar o método GetJumpList obter <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>atualmente associado um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not require that this be the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> that is currently applied to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework não requer que seja o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>que está atualmente aplicada para a shell do Windows.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The application associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A aplicação associada a <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> object associated with the specified application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> objeto associado a aplicação especificada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"></xref> objects that are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"> </xref> objetos que são apresentados na lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta uma lista de ir pode conter dois tipos de itens, um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>e um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> is a link to a program and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is a link to a file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>é uma hiperligação para um programa e um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>é uma hiperligação para um ficheiro.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is created, the JumpItems collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>é criada, o JumpItems coleção está vazia.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You can add any <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> or <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>ou <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>objetos na coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: The collection will only contain items that have been added by your program.
trans-unit.target: A coleção irá conter apenas itens que foram adicionados ao seu programa.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> has been passed to the Windows shell by a successful call to either the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> methods, the JumpItems collection will contain only the items that were successfully added to the taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>foi transmitido para a shell do Windows por uma chamada com êxito para ao <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>métodos, a coleção de JumpItems irá conter apenas os itens que foram adicionados com sucesso na barra de tarefas lista ir.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: Items that were not successfully added are removed from the JumpItems collection.
trans-unit.target: Os itens que não foram adicionados com sucesso são removidos da coleção JumpItems.

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder as listas de itens removidos através de processadores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"></xref> objects displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"> </xref> objetos apresentados na lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when jump items are not successfully added to the Jump List by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os itens de ir não são adicionados com êxito à lista de ir através da shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: After the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> are applied to the Windows shell, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois do conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>são aplicadas a shell do Windows, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>propriedade é modificada para incluir apenas os itens que a shell do Windows adicionada com êxito à lista de ir.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the JumpItemsRejected and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder às listas de itens removidos através de processadores de eventos para o JumpItemsRejected e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when jump items previously in the Jump List are removed from the list by the user.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando são removidos da lista de itens de ir anteriormente na lista de ir pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: After the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> are applied to the Windows shell, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois do conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>são aplicadas a shell do Windows, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>propriedade é modificada para incluir apenas os itens que a shell do Windows adicionada com êxito à lista de ir.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and JumpItemsRemovedByUser events.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder as listas de itens removidos através de processadores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>e eventos de JumpItemsRemovedByUser.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> object associated with an application.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> objeto associado a uma aplicação.

trans-unit.source: You can create multiple <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Pode criar vários <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: However, only one <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> at a time can be associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, apenas um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>numa altura, pode ser associado com um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: Call the SetJumpList method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> currently associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método SetJumpList para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>atualmente associado um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The application associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A aplicação associada a <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> to associate with the application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> para associar à aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os itens utilizados com frequência são apresentadas na lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Frequent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo a **Frequent** categoria são geridos através da shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the ShowFrequentCategory property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar os itens utilizados frequentemente na lista de ir, defina a propriedade de ShowFrequentCategory como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items.
trans-unit.target: O **Recent** e **Frequent** categorias contém muitas vezes, muitos dos itens ir mesmo.

trans-unit.source: As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, as aplicações normalmente apresentam um o **Recent** ou **Frequent** categoria na lista de ir, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os itens utilizados com frequência são apresentados na lista ir; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether recently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os itens utilizados recentemente são apresentadas na lista de ir.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo a **Recent** categoria são geridos através da shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the ShowRecentCategory property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar os itens utilizados frequentemente na lista de ir, defina a propriedade de ShowRecentCategory como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items.
trans-unit.target: O **Recent** e **Frequent** categorias contém muitas vezes, muitos dos itens ir mesmo.

trans-unit.source: As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, as aplicações normalmente apresentam um o **Recent** ou **Frequent** categoria na lista de ir, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> method to request that the Windows shell add items to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>método para pedir que a shell do Windows adicionar itens para a **Recent** lista de itens.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file name type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> will fail silently.
trans-unit.target: Se a aplicação não está registada para processar o tipo de nome de ficheiro do item, não irão aparecer no **Recent** lista e chamadas para <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>irá falhar de forma silenciosa.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if recently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se forem apresentados itens utilizados recentemente na lista de ir; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
